response.overview: The power of science has enabled electricity to reach the human world and play an increasingly important role in production and life. Electricity is a commodity. To use this kind of civilized product, we must adopt a civilized attitude, pay attention to planning, and follow the principle of commodity exchange. The illegal use of electricity, and even the belief that "stealing electricity is not considered stealing", often causes family and social tragedies.
response.title: Special Merchandise: Electricity
